casebody.data:
STATE
v.
HARTMAN 2019-0184 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 1, 2019 APPEAL ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Cause accepted on proposition of law No. I. KENNEDY, FRENCH, and SADLER, JJ., would accept the cause on both propositions of law. O'CONNOR, C.J., and DEWINE and DONNELLY, JJ., dissent. LISA L. SADLER, J., of the Tenth District Court of Appeals sitting for STEWART, J.
